name: enLighten
description:
Explore the dark hidden corners of your mind, trying to answer a question that has plagued your psyche since you were left on your own. "Why?"

Gameplay consists of navigating pitch black labyrinths and obstacles through the use of light-shooting gun. Text is scattered and hidden about the levels, illuminating the premise with cryptic hints. Try to find them all and understand what happened!

Made for KSU Gamejam Fall 2018
